holidays.title: National Freedom Day
holidays.description: Savor and enjoy the freedom which comes with being an American citizen!

holidays.title: National Signing Day
holidays.description: Today, high school football players are eligible to commit to the college of their choice.

holidays.title: Abolition of Slavery Day
holidays.description: Join us as we explore Mauritius' rich history this Abolition of Slavery Day!

holidays.title: Car Insurance Day
holidays.description: Cruise in style on Car Insurance Day and see how you can remain safe and protected!

holidays.title: Change Your Password Day
holidays.description: Keep your online data safe by observing the password rules and staying wary online.

holidays.title: Conservatorship and Guardianship Abuse Awareness Day
holidays.description: Advocate for your fellow community members this Conservatorship and Guardianship Abuse Awareness Day!

holidays.title: Day of Remembrance and Respect to Victims of the Communist Regime
holidays.description: Today we remember all the fallen victims of the oppressive regime that once ruled Bulgaria.

holidays.title: Decorating with Candy Day
holidays.description: Today is the perfect day for those who have an insatiable sweet tooth.

holidays.title: Decorating With Candy Day
holidays.description: Get together with your loved ones and adorn your homes with candies and sweets.

holidays.title: Federal Territory Day
holidays.description: Federal Territory Day is known as Hari Wilayah Persekutuan or simply Hari Wilayah.

holidays.title: G.I. Joe Day
holidays.description: Get ready as we celebrate our favorite action figure of all time.

holidays.title: Global School Play Day
holidays.description: Today is the day to let the children run around as much as they want.

holidays.title: Heroes' Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the people who fought for change with their lives; they are our heroes.

holidays.title: Holiday Hugs Day
holidays.description: Drink lots of water to donate some blood for Holiday Hugs Day!

holidays.title: Hula in the Coola Day
holidays.description: Imagine Hawaii in the winter. Lift your spirits with some Hula in the cool weather.

holidays.title: Imbolc
holidays.description: Imbolc must be celebrated to ensure a successful farming season for the year ahead.

holidays.title: International Face and Body Art Day
holidays.description: Join the global celebration of face and body art on International Face and Body Art Day!

holidays.title: National Baked Alaska Day
holidays.description: Dig into this decadent dessert made with ice cream, sponge cake, and meringue.

holidays.title: National Cameron Day
holidays.description: Cameron is not just a gorgeous name — it has an unusual meaning behind it.

holidays.title: National Dark Chocolate Day
holidays.description: We don't need a reason to celebrate dark chocolate, but sure is sweet to have one.

holidays.title: National Get Up Day
holidays.description: "We all fall. It’s how we get up that matters."

holidays.title: National Girls and Women in Sports Day
holidays.description: National Girls and Women in Sports Day, abbreviated as N.G.W.S.D., is observed on February 1 this year and it is all about breaking the gender…

holidays.title: National Sean Day
holidays.description: Shawn, Sean, Shun? Whichever way you pronounce your name, today is your day!

holidays.title: National Serpent Day
holidays.description: Snakes symbolize power and evil and have been both feared and studied since ancient times.

holidays.title: National Texas Day
holidays.description: From Dr Pepper and B.B.Q.s, to vibrant people — Texas is home to many.

holidays.title: Robinson Crusoe Day
holidays.description: What’s so special about Robinson Crusoe and why has he inspired so many movies?

holidays.title: Spunky Old Broads Day
holidays.description: Unleash your inner sparkle! Light up your world with the most insanely awesome tips.

holidays.title: Tet Nguyen Dan
holidays.description: Why is Tet Nguyen Dan celebrated in February? Find out here!

holidays.title: World Aspergillosis Day
holidays.description: Make sure you’re taking good care of yourself during World Aspergillosis Day!

holidays.title: World Hijab Day
holidays.description: Join the movement as millions show their support for women who wear the hijab.

holidays.title: World Read Aloud Day
holidays.description: Practice your narrative skill by reading your favorite story aloud to your family, friends, and community.

holidays.title: Harry Styles’s Birthday
holidays.description: Harry Styles has sold millions of records, both as a soloist and as a band member.

holidays.title: Stormi Webster’s Birthday
holidays.description: This little fashion icon is just getting started and having a fashionista mum is a plus.
